bullets: • Amazon’s smart doorbell company Ring is now working with the AI-powered surveillance camera company Flock
• The partnership allows police agencies who use Flock software to request footage from Ring users in the Neighbors app
• Flock had previously allowed data access to the Secret Service and the Navy

• It's a new take on Mattel’s original version of the Atari 2600, which went head-to-head with Atari 2600 when it was released in 1979
• The Sprint looks a lot like the original, but there are a lot fewer cables
• It connects to a TV using a single HDMI cable
